verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm לְתוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> le-to-Dah; of praise הָרִ֥יעוּ <WH7321> ha-Ri-'u Make a joyful noise לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. all ye lands

עִבְד֣וּ <WH5647> 'iv-Du Serve אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בְּשִׂמְחָ֑ה <WH8057> be-sim-Chah; with gladness בֹּ֥אוּ <WH935> Bo-'u come לְ֝פָנָ֗יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav, before his presence בִּרְנָנָֽה׃ <WH7445> bir-na-Nah. with singing

דְּע֗וּ <WH3045> de-'U, Know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh ye that the LORD ה֤וּא <WH1931> hu Himself אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him he [is] God הֽוּא־ <WH1931> hu- Himself עָ֭שָׂנוּ <WH6213> 'A-sa-nu [it is] he [that] hath made; וְלֹא ve-lo כוְלֹ֣ו <WH3808> ve-Lo not קאֲנַ֑חְנוּ <WH587> 'a-Nach-nu; ourselves עַ֝מּ֗וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo, us and not we ourselves [we are] his people וְצֹ֣אן <WH6629> ve-Tzon and the sheep מַרְעִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH4830> mar-'i-To. of his pasture

בֹּ֤אוּ <WH935> Bo-'u Enter שְׁעָרָ֨יו׀ <WH8179> she-'a-Rav into his gates בְּתוֹדָ֗ה <WH8426> be-to-Dah, with thanksgiving חֲצֵרֹתָ֥יו <WH2691> cha-tze-ro-Tav [and] into his courts בִּתְהִלָּ֑ה <WH8416> bit-hil-Lah; with praise הֽוֹדוּ־ <WH3034> ho-du- be thankful ל֝֗וֹ lo, בָּרֲכ֥וּ <WH1288> ba-ra-Chu unto him [and] bless שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> she-Mo. his name

כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ט֣וֹב <WH2896> Tov [is] good יְ֭הֹוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [is] everlasting חַסְדּ֑וֹ <WH2617> chas-Do; his mercy וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against דֹּ֥ר <WH1755> dor [endureth] to all וָ֝דֹ֗ר <WH1755> va-Dor, generations אֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <WH530> e-mu-na-To. and his truth
